title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 214.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 214.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish a process by which
entities may be licensed as recognized and approved by the Commission to serve
asAuthorized Sanctioning Entities to supervise and oversee the conduct of
certain authorized combative sports in the state of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
214.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
